subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Haywoode Workman is one of only three N.B.A. players to ever become a referee. If players and referees are sometimes antagonists, there are plenty of similarities between the two jobs.
snippet: Haywoode Workman is one of only three N.B.A. players to ever become a referee. If players and referees are sometimes antagonists, there are plenty of similarities between the two jobs.
